mapper.select: SELECT SUM(price) as price,TO_CHAR(paydate, 'MM-DD') as paydate FROM payment_log where paydate between #{startdate} and #{enddate} and suc_check='성공' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(paydate, 'MM-DD') order by paydate

SELECT SUM(price) as price,TO_CHAR(paydate, 'YY-MM') as paydate FROM payment_log where paydate between add_months(to_date(#{month1}, 'YYYY-MM'), -6) and to_date(#{month2}, 'YYYY-MM') and suc_check='성공' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(paydate, 'YY-MM') order by paydate

select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select p.merchant_uid,m.name as username,p.name,p.price,p.paydate,p.imp_uid,p.suc_check from payment_log p inner join member m on p.member_idx=m.idx where paydate between #{startdate} and #{enddate} order by merchant_uid desc)a )b where rnum >=#{start} and rnum <=#{end}
